建议登录

2023.10.13

ua block fix, dynamic ua change everday

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
java.log(h[4])
java.log(h.length)
//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.floor(str1.length/2);
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]

strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
java.log(str.length)
java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}

<js>
data=JSON.parse(String(java.getElements('script.-1')).replace(/<\/?script>/g,'').replace(/window\.__pinia=/,''));
list=[];
for(d of data.my.search.novelList.result){
	ll={};
	k="";
	ll.n=d.title;
	ll.a=d.userVo.name;
	for(t of d.tagVos){
		k+=t.title+',';
	}
	ll.k=String(k).replace(/\,$/,'');
	ll.l=d.updatedAt;
	ll.i=d.intro;	
	ll.c='https://img.huahuo6.com/'+d.coverImageVo.path;	ll.b='https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/detail?id=' + d.id+'&_t='+Math.round(new Date());
	list.push(ll)
}
list
</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
{{@@p.-1@textNodes}}･{{@@span.-2@text}}
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleSearch.name: h3@text
